summary.p: Has been summoned with Benedikt Burgauer to participate in the Basel meeting - however, at their own expense; the Mayor of Waldkirch and Guild Master [Hans Schmid] will accompany them. Requests information on the matters to be discussed.

div.p: Benedikt and I have been appointed to go to Basel - our companions will be Mayor Waldkilch and one of the guild masters -, but under the condition that Benedikt and I travel at our own expense and that of the other fellow priests. Do you see, dearest brother, both the wisdom and piety of our council? They had decided that they did not want to send anyone from the ministers, but only two from the council. I do not know what finally came to their minds that they also added us.
But please let me know what issues we are going to discuss.
To the well-learned Master Heinrich Bullinger, preacher in Zurich, my dear lord and good friend.
